title: Rito moderating is a 12 out of 10 and doesnt knit pick or discriminate against pancakes.
body:
Exhibit A
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/Kzkf9zzx-fuck-lyte

It's ok to create a fuck a riot employee thread 

Exhibit B
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/M0RAUhVr-fiora-is-no-longer-sexy
Saying only "Fuck you riot" isnt low content.
 
Exhibit C
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/lptlYFVs-fuck-riot
Fuck Riot threads are ok because for  some reason Riot seems to be masochistic

Exhibit D
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/5R8q0vZg-fuck-you-riot
Next time you want to shit post just include the following word in your title "fuck"  and optionally followed by "Riot, or any of its employees."
And ctr+v it in your post.

ExhibitE
http://i.imgur.com/ycLF9bh.jpg 
 there's an instant 0 tolerance towards explicit pancakes threads
